...that these "$bb$Did You Know$/bb$" tips are displayed automatically, the first time you run $gt$ each day?
Usage Tips:
<ul $ul1$>
• Use the "$bb$Don't auto-show this tip again$/bb$" checkbox (below) if you don't want to see this specific tip anymore at startup.
• Once this checkbox is checked for all the tips, you won't see tips at startup, until a new tip is released.
• You can view all the tips anytime you want, by clicking the "$bb$Menu$/bb$" drop-down, and selecting "$bb$Did You Know?$/bb$".

NOTE: The "$bb$Don't auto-show this tip again$/bb$" checkbox only affects when tips are shown at startup. If you use the "$bb$Next$/bb$" or "$bb$Previous$/bb$" buttons, or you show tips from the "$bb$Menu$/bb$" drop-down, you will always be able to see all the tips.
